TopicTitle: Part modelling and texturing for gryphon labs.

Articles.Content:
NEW PROJECT!

Gryphon labs atomic super composer!

Model is in early stages and not set up. This will be an atomic engine that has a high thrust and is very fuel efficient but guzzles electricity. Better bring some solar panels! (another mod, perhaps?)

I am also going to make my own textures but feel free to post some of your own in the reply section

Batteries not included

Edited September 29, 2014 by Gryphon02

Hey Gryphon,

As one knew to modding myself, I understand what you mean. My advice, watch as many tutorials as you can get your hands on. Get the Blender mu importer so you can look at examples, and practice practice practice. Start with the expectation that your first few models, you will probably redo from scratch several times.

My first mod (about 4 months ago) looked like this:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Notice the lack of texture and rather horrible model.

Yesterday, I released this:

It just takes time and a little patience to develop your skills.

Good luck
